description: Imported on Wed Mar 15 2023 17:31:45 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

nodeDescription.value: Sends a password recovery OTP to user to verify they own this account
Sets a new password if the user exists and the submitted recovery code is valid

customHTML.value:
Password Reset

Enter your username, and we'll send password reset instructions to your email address.

nodeDescription.value: A form for the user to submit the username of the account they forgot the password to
Branch based on the button selected on the forgot password form
Received an unexpected value for button select on the forgot password form
An error occurred during account recovery

annotation.value: Return to Calling flow. Pass back userId

customHTML.value:
Success

Your password has been successfully updated.

nodeDescription.value: Branch based on the button selected on the forgot password form

customHTML.value:
Enter New Password

If you have an active account with a valid email address, you will receive an email with a recovery code which you may enter here, along with a new password.

If you do not have an account or email, please contact your administrator to recover your password.

nodeDescription.value: A form to enter the password recovery code and a new password

name: PingOne Forgot Password Subflow
